itinerary.mapNote: From Timberline Lodge. Sandy River crossing. 1060m.
Ramona Falls passed. McNeil Point vista. 1585m.
North side of Hood. Cooper Spur viewpoint. 1770m.
Zigzag Canyon. Return to lodge. Circuit complete. 1840m.

waypoints.name: Mount Hood Summit
waypoints.note: Oregon's highest peak. Active stratovolcano. Solfatara vents.

waypoints.name: Ramona Falls
waypoints.note: Mossy basalt columnar fall. Most popular waterfall on Hood.

waypoints.name: McNeil Point
waypoints.note: Stone shelter viewpoint. Best north-side Hood panorama.

waypoints.name: Timberline Lodge
waypoints.note: 1937 WPA lodge. 'The Shining' exterior. Year-round skiing above.

waypoints.name: Elliot Glacier
waypoints.note: Largest Hood glacier. Crevassed icefall on north face.
